description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.

DefinedTerm.description: A word, name, acronym, phrase, etc. with a formal definition. Often used in the context of category or subject classification, glossaries or dictionaries, product or creative work types, etc. Use the name property for the term being defined, use termCode if the term has an alpha-numeric code allocated, use description to provide the definition of the term.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

inDefinedTermSet.description: A DefinedTermSet that contains this term.

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.

termCode.description: A code that identifies this DefinedTerm within a DefinedTermSet.

DefinedTerm.title: DefinedTerm

DefinedTermSet.description: A set of defined terms for example a set of categories or a classification scheme, a glossary, dictionary or enumeration.

hasDefinedTerm.description: A Defined Term contained in this term set.

Intangible.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.
